meanings.sent1: The prefabricated house was built in a factory and then transported to the site.
meanings.sent2: The prefabricated parts were ready-made before being put together.
meanings.sent3: The prefabricated furniture saved a lot of time during the move.
meanings.sent4: Her prefabricated speech sounded rehearsed and lacking in authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The prefabricated sandwiches at the store tasted stale and unappetizing.

meanings.definition: Made in sections that can be easily assembled
meanings.sent1: The prefabricated shelves came with clear instructions for quick setup.
meanings.sent2: We bought a prefabricated gazebo that we could easily build in our backyard.
meanings.sent3: The kids pretended their fort was a prefabricated spaceship ready for takeoff.
meanings.sent4: The team worked together like prefabricated puzzle pieces fitting perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The prefabricated Lego sets allowed children to build intricate structures with ease.

meanings.definition: Constructed off-site and transported for final assembly
meanings.sent1: The prefabricated bridge was assembled on-site after being transported in pieces.
meanings.sent2: Prefabricated cabins are popular for their quick installation process.
meanings.sent3: The prefabricated swimming pool arrived on a truck, ready to be set up in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The prefabricated stage was easily put together for the concert.
meanings.sent5: The prefabricated walls were lifted into place by a crane during construction.
